did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Holograph diary in pencil including illustrations of the Blacklock home in Albany, NY, numerous male acquaintances, some erotic images, and other drawings.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Sterling Blacklock lived in Albany, NY and Bennington, VT with his lover Frank. They shared their home with another couple, Charles and Kevin. Sterling died in 1979. Charles died in 1991.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Holograph diary in pencil including illustrations of the Blacklock home in Albany, NY, numerous male acquaintances, some erotic images, and other drawings.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Sterling Blacklock diary, #7735. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
